groups.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client
groups.description: Provice configuration for baidu face open api

groups.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client.proxy
groups.description: Provice proxy configuration for baidu face open api

properties.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client.autoImport
properties.description: specify whether the client configuration should be imported automatically or not

properties.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client.appId
properties.description: appId, get it from baidu ai official website

properties.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client.apiKey
properties.description: apiKey, get it from baidu ai official website

properties.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client.secretKey
properties.description: secretKey, get it from baidu ai official website

properties.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipface.client.proxy.type
properties.description: specify the type of proxy, can be none/http/socket

properties.name: charleslzq.baidu.aipFace.basePath
properties.description: Specify url prefix for baidu face controllers
